titles: The renegado a tragæcomedie. As it hath beene often acted by the Queenes Maiesties seruants, at the priuate Play-house in Drurye-Lane. By Philip Massinger.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at the Crowne in Pauls Church-Yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
